about_the_game:
《铁山奇谭 序章》 is a demo version of 《铁山奇谭 》 that includes most of the mechanics and randomized story, but is limited to sixteen days. The current beta version has many program problems and game interaction problems, please do not hesitate to correct them, and we will improve them as soon as possible in future development.

Strange Tales of Tie-shan is a text-based adventure game inspired by the classical Chinese genre of records of anomalies (zhiguai xiaoshuo) and ancient Chinese printing culture. As a traveler who accidentally stumbled into Tie-shan, you find yourself in a land of darkness infested with ghosts and monsters. To survive, you must concoct elixirs, choose your path wisely, and negotiate with various supernatural beings.

Moreover, to escape from the Iron Mountain, you must risk your life to collect the most bizarre and peculiar stories to appease the possessed book in your hands - "Strange Tales of Tieshan."
